comments.body: here `ddot` is only called once in one training, so just use javaBLAS for simplication
Is this true for all the instances below though? CC @luhenry who might want to weigh in for consistency
Yes, they are called only once per fitting.

`javaBLAS` is faster than `nativeBLAS` from local experiment for all level-1 and level-2 operations. The cost of copying from java heap to native memory is too great for these operations, and is only amortized for level-3 operations. So switching to `javaBLAS` here for `ddot` makes sense to me.
